features.title: You don’t need to worry about the tech side — we handle it all for you
features.description: What You Get With This Setup

items.title: A complete online store setup
items.description: Get a fully functional Shopify store with domain, payment gateway, products, and design — all ready to start selling from day one

items.title: 1-year free domain (your brand name as a gift from us)
items.description: Claim a free 1-year .shop domain matching your brand name (subject to availability) to start your online journey professionally

items.title: Payment gateway integration so you can accept online payments easily
items.description: Seamless Razorpay integration so you can securely accept online payments from customers with ease

items.title: Branding, Identity & Design
items.description: Get a clean logo, custom banners, and basic content designed to give your store a professional look from the start

items.title: Training on how to manage your store & add products (free)
items.description: Learn step-by-step how to manage your store and add products yourself with our free training

items.title: Up to 20 products listed & ready to sell
items.description: We’ll list up to 20 of your products with images, descriptions, and pricing so your store is ready to sell immediately

testimonials.title: Project delivered in 25 days
testimonials.description: Your complete online store will be ready and delivered within 25 days, fully set up to launch

cta.title: Get a Team of Experts for the Price of One
cta.description: Get the expertise of 5 pros for the price of 1! Stop hiring interns—grow your business smarter with our flexible Ecommerce & Biz Dev Retainer. Cancel anytime.
